nodes.bodyText: That would make the two methods the exact same, hence the deletion of the override.
I missed it derived from AmmoBin in this case! Been playing with GitHub's code navigation features. Took me to EquipmentPart.

@sixlettervariables No worries, my first version of the fix was exactly that, removing the line.  I cleaned up the override prior to opening the PR when I realized they would be the same.  Thanks for the review and merge, will try to package up some other changes I have lying around locally.
